job_description: Description AFCC requires a co-op student for an eight-month term to assist in the engineering, functional development and capabilities of Ongoing Product Development & Reliability Engineering (OPD&RE).The student will participate in Ongoing Product Development by: Maintaining and developing engineering models (Excel) – this may be a primary activity Providing general engineering assistance in OPD&RE (ex. Root cause analysis) Developing technical capabilities related to OPD&RE Analysing data, writing reports, and leading technical presentations Developing standard practices and processes (ex. Design reviews, FMEA) Performing quality control functions under supervision of quality personnelNSERC Eligible
job_requirements: Requirements/Skills Key job skills include: Proficiency in Excel (data analysis, model development) Experience with Word (for writing technical documents) Data presentation using Power Point Enthusiasm (willingness to learn & develop) Excellent communication: speaking, listening, writing & reading Time management (independent work will often be required) Multi-tasking (ability to manage multiple projects from different areas of the company) Adaptability (ever-changing work environment) Ability to work in the lab, be very “hands on” Experience with VBA an asset Basic understanding of fuel cell operation is an assetAreas of Study Engineering, Applied Science, or equivalentAFCC values diversity in the workplace and is committed to Employment Equity.  We encourage applications from all qualified candidates.Open To All Majors:No
